title: 求帮忙下载一个地图，下载地址已给出
author: SMFX阜星
txt_content:
https://drive.google.com/uc?export=download&confirm=EZMI&id=0B7M-t9MQCGo5YzVSbXYtZDZtM2s

replies.author: xinxin1086
replies.txt_content:
